thread.title: Mets NLCS Game 3 lineup vs. Chicago Cubs: Have you heard of this Bartman guy?
thread.title_full: Mets NLCS Game 3 lineup vs. Chicago Cubs: Have you heard of this Bartman guy?

author: Mike Vorkunov | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Mets NLCS Game 3 lineup vs. Chicago Cubs: Have you heard of this Bartman guy?
text:
Comments 
CHICAGO â€” The last time the Cubs hosted a playoff game at Wrigley Field there was Steve Bartman . It's the lasting memory of Game 6 of the 2003 NLCS against the Marlins. 
Tuesday night, they host another one: Game 3 of this National League Championship Series . The Mets have a 2-0 lead and will put Jacob deGrom on the mound . Chicago will go with right-handed pitcher Kyle Hendricks. 
It's not a must-win game but Chicago risks falling behind 3-0. And only one team has even come back from 2-0 down in the NLCS out of the 10 that have fallen into that position since the series expanded to seven games in 1985.
